From the northern half of Malawi, more wonderful bangwe zither songs and malipenga kazoos, but also the karigo lute, the kubu bow, the kalimba - and exceptional a capella singing. Tonga, Tumbuka and Cewa peoples recorded by Hugh Tracey.

Historical recordings by Hugh Tracey.


Quality: 256Kbps + full booklet scans
